name: Kid Kujirai
description: When the Action Phase begins: Create 1 Omni Element. Then if your opponent's Support Zone is not full, transfer this card to your opponent's Support Zone.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the Action Phase begins:</color> Create 1 $[K411]. Then if your opponent's Support Zone is not full, transfer this card to your opponent's Support Zone.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the Action Phase begins:</color> Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>. Then if your opponent's Support Zone is not full, transfer this card to your opponent's Support Zone.
storytext: "When you hide a Temari, you have to hide it within the time of a Temari song. The person who is looking for it will also find it within a song's time. That will make the game fair!"
